alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 07 at 2:24PM MDT until May 09 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 to 4 inches on mountain passes, and 4 to 10 inches possible above mountain passes. * WHERE...Beaverhead, Gallatin and Madison Counties. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could difficult at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall rates are expected Sunday night, producing some impacts to travel Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
